foodMenu.title: Muay Thai Negroni
foodMenu.subTitle: Chili-infused gin • Campari • Sweet vermouth • Kaffir lime
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Strength, balance & fire in one glass

foodMenu.title: Tuk Tuk Martini
foodMenu.subTitle: Dry gin • Lemongrass • Dry vermouth • Kaffir lime oil
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Shaken, not stirred – James Bond in Siam

foodMenu.title: Mango Coco Bellini
foodMenu.subTitle: Prosecco • Mango purée • Coconut liqueur • Lime mist
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Golden & luminous – the butterfly’s kiss at sunset

foodMenu.title: The Kinky Lady & The Kinky Gentlemen
foodMenu.subTitle: Vodka • Thai chili • Passionfruit • Lime • Lemongrass foam
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Fiery and seductive — sweet heat that teases and lingers

foodMenu.title: The Butterfly Effect
foodMenu.subTitle: Gin • Blue butterfly pea • Elderflower • Yuzu • Champagne top-up
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Color that transforms — beauty in motion

foodMenu.title: One Night In Bangkok
foodMenu.subTitle: Tequila Reposado • Tamarind • Belgian honey • Lime • Chili salt rim
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: A smoky, spicy serenade

foodMenu.title: Tom Yum Noir – Black Tiger Symphony
foodMenu.subTitle: Clear Tom Yum broth with lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime & grilled Black Tiger prawns.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Fiery Thai soul performed with European grace.

foodMenu.title: Tom Kha Kai – Cappuccino The Coconut
foodMenu.subTitle: Coconut–galangal soup with tender Belgian chicken & kaffir lime foam.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Tradition reborn in a modern silk of coconut and spice.

foodMenu.title: Croquette Siam – Massaman de Flandre
foodMenu.subTitle: Thai–Belgian croquettes of slow-braised Massaman beef & potato, tamarind-ale glaze.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Belgian heart meets Thai chili soul in a golden embrace.

foodMenu.title: Butterfly Spring Roll – Garden of Light
foodMenu.subTitle: Fried rice paper rolls with prawns, mango, avocado & Thai basil, butterfly pea dip.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Beauty in motion — the butterfly of LittleThaiBySanito.

foodMenu.title: Black Tiger Dumplings – Phuket Noir
foodMenu.subTitle: Charcoal dumplings with Black Tiger prawns, soy–lime emulsion & gold leaf.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Mystery and elegance — power folded in beauty.

foodMenu.title: Thai Tartare – Belgian Blue in Thai Lime
foodMenu.subTitle: Belgian Blue beef tartare with chili, lime, shallot & roasted rice, topped with crispy dumpling tost.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: A handshake between Belgium and Thailand — raw, pure, alive.

foodMenu.title: Tod Man Pla – Golden Fish Cake Bites
foodMenu.subTitle: North Sea cod cakes with kaffir lime, turmeric aioli & sweet chili glaze.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Golden treasures from the Andaman Sea.

foodMenu.title: Satay Royale – Grill The Poulet
foodMenu.subTitle: Premium chicken or pork satay with coconut–turmeric marinade & peanut sauce.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Street fire dressed in royal silk.

foodMenu.title: Bangkok Duck – Red Curry & Chicory Glaze
foodMenu.subTitle: Seared duck breast with red curry, coconut, baby eggplants, sweet basil, and grilled chicory.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Fiery elegance in balance.

foodMenu.title: Khiao Wan Ayutthaya – Essence of Balance
foodMenu.subTitle: Chicken simmered in creamy green curry, coconut milk, baby eggplants, kaffir lime & sweet basil.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Harmony in every bite.

foodMenu.title: Chao Phraya Rouge – Essence of Passion
foodMenu.subTitle: Red curry of Chicken, Beef or Prawn with coconut milk, eggplants, pineapple & Thai basil.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Where Thai fire flows with Belgian warmth.

foodMenu.title: Kua Kling Moo – Spirit of the South
foodMenu.subTitle: Dry-fried Belgian pork with Southern Thai yellow curry, kaffir lime & turmeric.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Bold, golden & unapologetically real.

foodMenu.title: Siam Black Pepper – Fire & Grace
foodMenu.subTitle: Belgian Blue beef wok-fried with black pepper, garlic & Thai soy caramel.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Bold heat and refined elegance in harmony.

foodMenu.title: Golden Wok – Essence of Harmony
foodMenu.subTitle: Stir-fried chicken with roasted cashew nuts, dried chili, onion & tamarind glaze.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: A golden balance of sweet, salty & spice.

foodMenu.title: Holy Smoke Basil – Pad Krapow Opera
foodMenu.subTitle: Stir-fried holy basil with chicken or beef, chili & garlic in smoky wok aroma.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: A street classic reborn in fine-dining harmony.

foodMenu.title: Andaman Pearl – Seabass & Kaffir Lime Beurre Blanc
foodMenu.subTitle: Steamed seabass with Thai herbs, lime leaf green seafood & chili-lime foam.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Delicate as a butterfly wing, strong as the ocean tide.

foodMenu.title: Crying Tigers – Tigers Don't Cry
foodMenu.subTitle: Grilled beef filet Thai-style with spicy dipping sauce and sticky rice.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Flame, smoke & heart — a story of strength and passion.

foodMenu.title: Pad Thai Black Tiger – The Golden Thread
foodMenu.subTitle: Classic Pad Thai noodles with tamarind caramel, roasted peanuts & Black Tiger prawns or Chicken.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Thailand’s national pride reborn with elegance and glow.

foodMenu.title: Som Tam Gai Yang – The Spirit of Isaan
foodMenu.subTitle: Green papaya salad with grilled chicken or Black Tiger prawns and sticky rice.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Freshness, fire & soul — the beating heart of Thai life.

foodMenu.title: Siam Aubergine Silk
foodMenu.subTitle: Grilled Belgian aubergine • Red curry coconut cream • Kaffir lime crumble
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Soft, smoky & aromatic — the essence of Thai comfort.

foodMenu.title: Larb Flanders – Isaan Soul Meets Westvlaanderen
foodMenu.subTitle: Spicy minced pork salad with lime, chili & herbs, inspired by Belgian produce.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: The warmth of Isaan mingles with the heart of Flanders.

foodMenu.title: Rainbow Fried Rice – Harmony of the Gulf
foodMenu.subTitle: Wok-fried jasmine rice with glass noodles, prawns, ham, onion, carrot & sweet pepper.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: A colorful symphony of Thai & European flavors.

headingtext.subTitle: The Heart of Thai Soul and Belgian Art

foodMenu.title: Thai Basil Crème Brûlée
foodMenu.subTitle: Lemongrass caramel and gold leaf on top.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Elegant and balanced.

foodMenu.title: Mango Butterfly Garden
foodMenu.subTitle: Mango and sticky rice, passionfruit gel & edible butterfly tuile.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: Sweet and artistic.

foodMenu.title: Crispy Thai Pancake
foodMenu.subTitle: Crispy Thai pancake with a touch of coconut and sweetness.
foodMenu.priceSubTitle: A perfect ending.
